alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:01PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rainfall will impact portions of northeastern Cherry, northern Rock, northern Brown, northwestern Holt, Keya Paha and Boyd Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1159 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms wit heavy rainfall from near Norden to 6 miles south of Butte. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph and small hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Springview, Butte, Naper, Norden, Dustin, Burton, Anoka, Nets Peak, Meadville, North River Trail, Mariaville, Mills, Brocksburg, Spencer Dam, and Anncar. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 206 and 225. Highway 281 between mile markers 205 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 24 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
